forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 75, with temperatures falling to around 71 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a soft veil of partly clouded skies greets the day. The air carries a refreshing chill, tapering down to a mild 59 degrees, with a gentle breeze whispering from the west. This tranquility is set against the backdrop of a city poised to unfurl its charm in the warm embrace of the afternoon sun. Expect a graceful transition into a day of radiant sunshine, with temperatures climbing to a pleasant 75 degrees before settling comfortably around 71.

The clarity of the day promises a sparkling visibility, free from the heavy fog that can sometimes drape the city in its cool, muted tones. Instead, the horizon hints at a softness only nature can provide, allowing for an intimate stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a moment spent sipping a warm beverage at a café while people-watching. Light layers will serve well against the crisp morning air; a cardigan or light jacket in the early hours can be accompanied by a breezy shirt as the day warms. Such conditions invite both the adventurer and the leisurely spirit alike to relish the beauty of the city, making it an ideal day for enjoying the outdoors or relishing a quiet afternoon indoors with a view of the lively streets.
